name: @o4o-apps/forum-yaksa
description: Forum Extension for Yaksa Organization - Drug database, case studies, and pharmacy management

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist/backend/entities dist/backend/services && cp src/*.js src/*.d.ts src/*.js.map src/*.d.ts.map dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cd src/backend/entities && cp *.js *.d.ts *.js.map *.d.ts.map ../../../dist/backend/entities/ 2>/dev/null || true && cd ../services && cp *.js *.d.ts *.js.map *.d.ts.map ../../../dist/backend/services/ 2>/dev/null || true
